name: Nowledge Mem
description: Local-first personal memory for Alma, powered by nmem CLI
author: Nowledge Labs

tools.description: Search your personal knowledge base by semantic relevance.
Store an insight, decision, or finding in your personal knowledge base.
Read your daily Working Memory briefing from ~/ai-now/memory.md.

nowledgeMem.autoRecall.description: Inject Working Memory and relevant memories on the first outgoing message per thread.

nowledgeMem.autoCapture.description: Save active thread to Nowledge Mem when Alma quits.

nowledgeMem.maxRecallResults.description: Maximum memories to include during auto-recall.
